archimate:Plateau.name: OO 7: LSSTCam Phase 2 (Plateau)
archimate:Plateau.documentation: The LSSTCam Phase 2 Plateau builds on the LSSTCam Phae 1 Bundle by adding the resources needed to perform real-time production of Alerts. By this time, the alert distibution system which routes real-time events to the brokers has been constructred and has been exercised in offline mode.
